title: Replace repeated travel images with unique visuals (APT reference)

requirements.text: Generate and add new, distinct travel photography images (no repeats across cards/sections) using https://aptraavelservices.com/ as the visual reference style.

quotes: give the different image for dont use the same image https://aptraavelservices.com/ use this as refference

acceptanceCriteria: All new images are placed as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The generated images are visually distinct (different destinations/scenes) and consistent in photographic style inspired by the reference site.

requirements.text: Update the Tour Packages page so each package card uses its own unique image instead of reusing /assets/generated/tour-packages-section-image.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png for every card.

quotes: give the different image for dont use the same image

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/TourPackages.tsx, the grid of package cards no longer references a single shared image for every card.
Each package card renders a unique image file from /assets/generated/.
The page still builds and routes correctly to booking when clicking “Book Now”.

requirements.text: Update the Honeymoon Offers page so each offer card uses a unique image (remove the current 3-image rotation pattern based on offer.id).
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/HoneymoonOffers.tsx, offer cards no longer use src={`/assets/generated/honeymoon-offer-${((offer.id - 1) % 3) + 1}.dim_800x600.png`}.
Each of the 6 honeymoon offer cards uses a different image file from /assets/generated/.

requirements.text: Avoid reusing the same section images across multiple pages (e.g., Home vs About, Home vs Tour Guide) by assigning Home page sections their own dedicated images.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx, the About section image is not the same asset used on frontend/src/pages/About.tsx.
In frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx, the Tour Guide section image is not the same asset used on frontend/src/pages/TourGuide.tsx.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts).
Serve images as static frontend assets (do not route images through the backend).
nonGoals: Changing copy/content of the pages beyond what is required to swap image assets.
Adding new backend endpoints or storing images on the backend.

required: Wide travel hero photograph: modern aspirational destination scene (home-hero-banner.realphoto.dim_1600x900.png)
Travel agency team or planning scene photograph (home-about-section.realphoto.dim_1200x800.png)
